case.state: The ocean looks beautiful! When the game's done, we gotta go swimming!
My name is Sheena Fujibayashi. No, I am not here to take your drink order.
I am Sheena, chief of the village of Mizuho, and one of the last summoners in this world.
Sheena Fujibayashi, at your service.
Huh? Oh! You're from another world, too?
W-wait hang on, ~player~! You're going to play like that? Are you an exhibitionist?
Did you put on enough sunscreen, ~player~? Sorry to disappoint you, but I already did mine myself. I'm actually quite flexible!
This place looks so pretty! Makes me want jump over that bar and dive right into the ocean.
I guess Luna Nova is the name of your school, right? I'm afraid I never been there. But I'm surprised you can tell that I'm a magic user!
I went to the effort of putting on a swimsuit, and we're not even going to the beach? Are you guys kidding me?
This is actually the uniform of the girls who work at the casino of Altamira, but they gave it to me as well, after I won a lot of games there, so...
Corrin? Your name reminds me of a late friend of mine... Oh, Corrine...
Oh, you brought your nanny with you? Are you even old enough to play this game with us, little lady?
You can fly? Erm... How do you do that? Is it some kind of technology?
What would Raine say if she knew I was in a school on a Saturday to play cards... I hope this isn't illegal, ~player~.
What would Raine say if she knew I was in a school on a Sunday to play cards... I hope this isn't illegal, ~player~.
How did we end up on a school roof? Isn't school supposed to be closed on a Saturday? Well, at least we won't be seen by any students this way...
How did we end up on a school roof? Isn't school supposed to be closed on a Sunday? Well, at least we won't be seen by any students this way...
Ah, the sea! I should have brought my swimsuit! But that'd make it too easy for you, right, ~player~?
We're already in your bedroom, ~player~? How convenient for you. But no matter what you have planned, I'll sleep in my bed tonight. Alone!
Playing such a game in a classroom on a ~weekday~... Are you sure there's no students around anymore?
Playing this game and jumping into the hot spring right after actually sounds pretty nice!
To be honest, this isn't the first time I've played such a game in a mansion. The owner was pretty disappointed when I beat everyone without losing a hand.
This is an interesting location... Do you have any plans with one of us after this game, ~player~?
We're playing on top of a school? I hope we're up high enough that people can't see us.
I think I've seen wings like that before, in Raine's monster book. But you're no monster, are you?
Don't worry, I dealt with witches before, like the one from the fake Chosen's party. And if it comes to it, my Guardian Seal will protect me from your spells.
I have to warn you; playing cards is one of my specialties. Even if it's this kind of game.
Cards aren't that different from the seals I usually use in battle. Prepare to lose!
Oh, well, it's fun to play poker every now and then. I wouldn't want to get out of practice. Even if it's this kind of poker.
One man alone with multiple women? Sounds like a situation that pervert Zelos would definitely enjoy...
This many women, and one man? I bet he's very happy with this arrangement, but I'll teach him some manners soon enough.
So we're playing with men? This must be a paradise for perverts. How come Zelos isn't here yet?
So we're playing with men? Well, alright, I'll teach you perverts some manners.
Wow! No need to change cards with a hand like this.
Sorry, dealer! I won't exchange cards this round.
I think I'll only trade one card this round. Should be more than enough.
Alright! Give me ~cards~ new cards!
Hey, dealer! Give me ~cards~ cards!
I need ~cards~ new cards, please!
Quit staring and give me ~cards~ cards already!
Hey, dealer~♥! Can you give me ~cards~ aces if possible?
If I ask nicely, can you give me ~cards~ really good cards, please?
Seems like I didn't lose my talent along with my sash after all.
I feel like I just can't lose!
You're in for a world of hurt.
You'll never see me undress!
That's what I wanted.
All those hours in the casino of Altamira weren't for naught.
Is that really just luck? Or am I really that good?
I'll be fine this round. But I didn't expect otherwise.
Nothing to worry about this round. That gives me enough time to read in the faces of the others.
You know a good hand is more than luck. At least, it is with me!
Guess I'm proof that you don't need to be some egghead to do good at this game!
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
Doing well this round, ~player~? Don't lose too fast on me, okay?
I may have lost more than I intended, but I won't lose my cool.
Things are looking up! I won't lose again.
A good hand again? Splendid!
Oh, there's no way I can lose this one!
I promise I won't use my ninja arts to cheat. I could hide cards all over my person, believe me. I doubt anyone would notice.
Sorry, no illusions here. Just the very real road to victory!
I already lost so much, but I'm definitely not going to lose now!
This is going to end up being too little too late, huh?
I really needed this hand!
Now I get a good hand? I'm already exposed, so I can't get too excited about it.
Oh, a good hand again... At least it proves I'm not a total idiot.
Come on, Sheena! You can do better than average...
Don't want to wait too long. Let's get started!
Is everyone ready to reveal their hands? Or is anyone scared to lose to me?
I hope nobody is cheating. I'm playing fair, so everyone else should as well.
Let's see... Oh, I have a good hunch who might be losing this round...
Oh... I expected better, but I think it's still a decent hand.
No going back once you exchange your cards. Gotta play the hand you're dealt.
I hope none of you are perverts. I already know someone with enough perviness for everyone here...
You can always count on there being some weird people at places like this. ...No offense.
I've been in adventuring parties for so long, it's honestly a little weird fighting solo again.
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
I'm ready. What about you, ~player~?
Ready, ~player~?
Hey, ~player~! If you show me your hand, I'll show you mine.
Well, no folding now, huh?
Not good. Not bad, either, but not good.
The moment before the cards are revealed is always so exciting.
This hand depends too much on the others. If no one else has a worse...
I need better hands if I want to stay dressed. Knowing my luck... I'd better not count on winning here.
I've seen worse. It's not like I won a few hands like that against that stupid Chosen before.
Doing card tricks is pretty fun, but if I do too much I might reveal my entire hand!
It's nice to just enjoy the quiet moments, when the game slows and everyone gets the chance to breathe.
I was never the strategist of my party, but I think I've got a good idea on how to win!
I think I'll manage. What about you, ~player~?
Do you have a good hand this time, ~player~? Well, I'll see it soon anyway.
Hard to read on your face, ~player~. If I had to guess, I'd say you're busy having dirty thoughts.
I have to do better than this if I intend to keep my kimono...
This isn't really what I was hoping for... But it's okay.
I really hope this is good enough. Otherwise...
It would be so embarrassing if word of this got back to the rest of the Mizuho clan...
What I really need is a top tier hand now? I need something better if I want to turn this around.
Why do I feel a pitfall coming on?
Ngh! It's still too early to lose my gloves.
This can't be! The first round and I get a hand like this!? That can't be right!
Oh, no... I've made a mistake...
Come on! You can do better than that, Sheena...
H-hey! Why did I get a hand like that!?
Mmh... None of you better turn out to be perverts...
I'm in trouble...
You're kidding me!
N-no! That wasn't supposed to happen.
I really have the urge to punch someone right now. You're lucky that I'm against violence.
You're not going to see me mess up again. Not this time!
It would be wrong to just pull some sleight of hand to get out of losing, right?
Try to read my poker face, ~player~!
Is winning important to you, ~player~? I mean, you could just throw this hand. Other players who accidentally got a bad hand would appreciate that.
I can't read anything in your face, ~player~. But I doubt you have something worse than me, right?
But I was sure I'd get... Ugh...
But why? I made no mistakes exchanging that card...
Ugh, I feel like such an idiot!
Who shuffled this deck?!
Hey, this seems worse than my usual luck!
It's not that I haven't turned around situations like this before, but...
Are you doing this on purpose?! Did Zelos put you up to this?
It looks like I have a strong affinity for falling down holes... and being dealt bad hands.
I think... I think I might've traded in the wrong card...
I know being angry at the dealer doesn't change anything, but...
Even if I'd tried to change this hand with one of my tricks, in my current situation, I'm sure I'd mess it up...
Why of all times do I have to mess up now? Why does that always happen to me?
I deserve a trip the hot springs after this...
A good ninja always has a back up plan! Just give me a second to think of one...
I had a feeling from the way things were going that I was going to end up the first one completely naked. I'm not mad... just disappointed.

state.text: I was sure you'd be the first one out, ~player~. Looks like you're not only here to watch the others strip, but also to play a good round of poker after all.

case.state: I can only hope you are clothed like that to give yourself a handicap, ~player~! If you're just some random pervert, I'll show no mercy.
You're the one who initialized all this, right, ~player~? If you're just here because you think this is an easy way to get some ladies naked, I won't make it easy for you.
You're the one who initialized this, right, ~player~? Not what I expected from a lady, but I guess there are all sorts...
Tips? I doubt any tips from me would help you in any way, Leonie. Unless you you plan to learn how to fight with seal cards in the near future.
So... is Plagg your spirit guardian? You two certainly have strange magic... but... now I miss Corrine.
Oh-- this explains so much.
I'll call you Miko, then. Doesn't need to be any more complicated than that.
Flowers? Hey, Amalia! That's cheating!
Drinking? Now? Wouldn't you rather keep your wits about you?
Even that hair is multicolored? I didn't even know that was possible...
A good mercenary? I think a good mercenary is reliable and finishes the job he was tasked with... unlike me.
There are more Fujiyabashis where you live? I mean, of course, why not? I know a fortune teller from Triet by the way. But all she could do was state the obvious about friendships and such.
A memento... I always carry Corrine's bell with me as a memento, too. You should take good care of that necklace, Estelle.
Your "consort", huh..? What kind of roleplay are you doing..?
Sure! The rules of my clan prohibit me from showing you the really interesting stuff, but I'm sure I can show you some of my tricks.
Where did this girl come from all of a sudden? Is she a friend of yours?
You sure have an... interesting friend, Ryuko. She certainly knows how to steal the spotlight.
You have two hair colors, Zizou? How come? It's not dyed, is it?
You're a pirate, though! Haven't you seen all kinds of sea monsters?
The surname "Fujibayashi" seems to be more common than I thought. But even if we were related, I wouldn't hold back anyway.
Be careful, Noelle! If you just put an apron on, you could activate some people's fetishes.
It's certainly a surprise to play poker with the undead. But then again, what is even normal in this place?
Okay, not the end of the world. It's not like I've ever had particularly good luck. I should have figured it couldn't last...
I can't believe I used my summoning like that. Even after things were going so well! Why do I always get stuck with the most rotten luck?
Well, well, well! Maybe Raine heard me from wherever she is and got my back! Things are starting to look up again! I always knew I could count on her, but that's usually when she's here!
Did I remember to warn you all I might sweep you just like this? I don't usually warn people before I hit them like that.
See? You don't get to be chief of Mizuho if you can't hold your own in a tense situation! Look at me go!
Man, I really am on a roll! Maybe I should take this hot streak down to the casino in Altamira before it wears off!
If can conquer the coliseum in Meltokio, I can handle a little card came like this! Just watch me go!
Ugh... I did not scour every corner of Tethe'alla and Sylvarant and prove my mettle in combat to the spirits just to... hide my boobs...
My good fortune has died and needs resurrecting. Where's Raine where you need her?
I will admit--- begrudgingly--- that I do respect anyone who can put up a good fight against me...
Hey! I'm not the first one to lose all her clothes! How about that!
Oh, please don't ask how I know about that pervert's size. It's a long story...

Luna is a Summon Spirit of Light. I met her at the top of the Tower of Mana, but she wouldn't form a pact until I reunited her with another light summon spirit: Aska. That took a lot of effort to set up...
Undine is the Summon Spirit of Water, if that wasn't obvious. We met her on the island of Thoda. It's got this amazing geyser that tourists flock to! We got a way better look at it than any tourist!

Sylph is the Summon Spirit of Wind. There's three of them and I had to fight them all together to prove myself to them. Thankfully, I had Lloyd and the others to help me out at the time. I couldn't have done it without them!

So earlier that was Gnome... the Summon Spirit of Earth. He's... a bit different from the other spirits. He doesn't like to stand on ceremony. It goes against everything I was taught, but it's how he likes to do things.
Celsius is the Summon Spirit of Ice. I met her at the Ice Temple near Flanoir. It was so cold in Flanoir, but the falling snow is so pretty. Just standing and watching it is so romantic.
Shadow is the Summon Spirit of Darkness. He's not very talkative, but then there's the Centurion of Darkness, Tenebrae. Boy, could he ever talk! Man, sometimes I miss that cranky old man!
Playing cards aren't exactly paper seals, but they feel familiar enough. Consider me armed and dangerous.
If things get really rough, I can always call on a summon spirit for help. There's no way it's gonna get that bad for me though, right?
An assassin is supposed to avoid the direct attention of danger... not that I've been particularly good as the assassin-y part of my job...
This whole place is pretty crazy, but I'm no stranger to traveling between worlds. I wonder if this one was split off from some other world too.
I've only got my swimsuit left, but there's still one thing I can try! Undine!
I might be sort of dressed like one still, but I'm not a serving girl and I don't do requests! Luna!
My clothes? Well, you can say that it's a traditional outfit. People in Mizuho have a lot of very old traditions. My outfit is pretty unique even for my village though.
Gosh, thanks! Most days I'm lucky if I can even get clothes that fit me. Sometimes I worry that my style suffers for it.
I mean... I wouldn't say "some kind of." I would just say "ninja." You know?
Summon spirits? Yes. Can't say I've ever heard of a... Kwami?
They just sort of go wherever they want! Thanks to our pact, I can channel their strength even if we're worlds apart. Once I've channeled enough of it, the spirit will appear before us!
So there are multiple summoners in your world? Really? I'm the only one left back home, so I've never met another summoner!
Look, I wasn't working with much in the first place. I'll be out of small stuff after this though, so... congratulations.
I'm real, Kaz. As real as they come, in fact.
Please, I can pull this off without any tricks. You don't have to worry about me playing dirty.
Me? I fight using my paper seals. They help me channel my elemental ninjutsu artes.
I don't think there's any place like home! Doesn't matter where you look!
Yeah, I am. Same as you, it seems.
This wouldn't be any fun if there was no challenge at all. I'm not worried about it.
They're--- wait, you think this is boring? Seriously?
Really? What makes you think so? Do I remind you of her somehow?
You're proud of me... for what exactly?
I'm not here to assassinate ~player~ or anyone else. You might die of embarrassment when I beat you, but that's not my intention.
Can't say I've ever heard of Inazuma. My home is called Mizuho, but I am a summoner...
You're blowing this out of proportion. There isn't anything wrong with my soul...
N-no? You looked so serious when you were talking about it! I didn't know what you were going on about!
How do you... no, she's not here. I didn't really think to bring along anyone I knew to this sort of thing.
Summon Spirits, of course! I can call forth any spirit I've made a pact with! Need a demonstration?

Ah... that's... complicated. Normally to travel between worlds we would use the Rheairds to do that sort of travel. When our world was still split between Tethe'alla and Sylvarant, that was the only way to cross between them.
That's okay, Roll. It's weird for me to think about a world where none of that stuff exists, but its our differences that make this fun!
I could ask you the very same thing, Yae.
Oh, I am most definitely not alone. I fight alongside a lot of folks, not just one "partner." It's hard to know where to start when you ask it like that.
Oh, please. I'm not some helpless damsel in distress. I can take care of myself far better than you can!
Do I detect a hint of jealousy, Yae? Wish you had more to show off?
No worries, Chun-Li! The times where I worked as an assassin are long-gone. Actually, I never even completed an assassination in the first place...
Thanks, Sakura! Maybe I lost this round, but I'll try to keep as much of my outfit as possible.
I'm sure there's lots of places where this is called a kimono, Akko. But no matter what you call it, I really don't like losing it...
Huh? I must not be a very good assassin if you could tell like that...
It's a bit vain, but I think the ribbon makes me look sexy, don't you?
Ah! That's supposed to be a secret. You must be really insightful!
Can you phrase it in any other way? At all?
Me? I'm starting to lose more than I expected. Guess I just have to go along with it...
Me again? If I had known I'd have to strip my pants right away... I feel like an idiot now.
Ah, yeah, there's the pitfall...
Come one, Sheena, don't get psyched out...
It was naive to think I could win this game without losing my kimono, huh?
Can't I just get one moment of privacy while I do this? Undine, help!
I lost? Fine... but don't get too excited! I call upon the heavenly messengers. I summon thee... come, Sylph!
No use in freaking out. I'll show you how to keep cool! I call upon the disciple of everlasting ice. I summon thee... Come, Celsius!
Hey, maybe keep your eyes off me for a few seconds! I summon thee... come, Luna!
Just because I lost doesn't mean I have to show you anything! I call upon the envoy from the dark abyss. I summon thee... come, Shadow!
Okay, so you all want a show? How's this for a big show? I call upon the servant of Mother Earth. I summon thee... come, Gnome!
No reason to sweat the small stuff.
Yeah, yeah... I lost a round. Don't get too excited!
In case you were thinking about ogling my body, you should know that with me, the smacks come first and the warnings come afterwards.
Okay, fine. I'll be a good sport. You're all pretty cool about this after all...
I know I'm about to be naked, but losing right after making such a big production is waaay more embarrassing...
I sense a conspiracy...
Great, just what I needed. Another setback...
Ugh! Fine, I'll strip my pants, if you want to see me naked that badly.
And here I thought I'd never lose this much...
It's kind of scary how fast I went from thinking I couldn't lose to being set this far back...
Don't freak out, Sheena. Just keep a cool head! I call upon the disciple of everlasting ice. I summon thee... Come, Celsius!
Do you pervs really need to see everything? I'm allowed a few seconds of privacy! Undine, help!
If you want to see something interesting, how about I give you a real show? I call upon the heavenly messengers. I summon thee... come, Sylph!
It's my turn, so I decide how my top comes off! I call upon the light of the heaven. I summon thee... come, Luna!
Yeah, like I'd just roll over that easily!I call upon the envoy from the dark abyss. I summon thee... come, Shadow!
I won't give you the satisfaction! Not yet! I call upon the servant of Mother Earth. I summon thee... come, Gnome!
Ugh, this is quite unfortunate...
You got me...
What? Me? Well, sure, if you want me to...
In case you were thinking about ogling my body, you should know that with me, the smacks come first and the warnings come afterwards.
Oh fine... I'm not thrilled about losing, but I'd like an argument about it even less.
Yeah, yeah... I'll do it. I'll strip my last piece of clothing. I... I'm ready, I guess...
That's the reason why I hate ~weekday~s...
This will be easier if I just ignore where everyone is staring...
Oh, I wouldn't say I'm out of tricks just yet.
... Wow... summoning didn't help... at all...
And right on cue, things go from bad to worse!
Oh, I get it! This is a bad dream! My luck can't be this bad! I bet I'll wake up in just a moment, right? ...Right?
Of all the rotten luck! This isn't over! Undine, help!
I think I've earned a bit of privacy this time around! I call upon the heavenly messengers. I summon thee... come, Sylph!
I know you perverts want to see my boobs, but how about a cold shoulder instead?I call upon the disciple of everlasting ice. I summon thee... Come, Celsius!
I'm not going down without a fight! You'd better believe I'm pulling out all the stops! I call upon the light of the heaven. I summon thee... come, Luna!
Did you really think I'd just roll over? Think again! I call upon the envoy from the dark abyss. I summon thee... come, Shadow!
... Screw it. Not like I can make things any worse! I call upon the servant of Mother Earth. I summon thee... come, Gnome!
Is everyone else wearing more clothes than me? Did I really show up underprepared and lose first thing?
W-what!? This can't be happening. I'm losing?
Well done, you perverts! You brought me down to your level.
I'm going to pound that creep Zelos into a fine paste for this! Who cares if it's not his fault! Someone has to pay!
In case you were thinking about ogling my body, you should know that with me, the smacks come first and the warnings come afterwards.
Oh fine... I'm not thrilled about losing, but I'd like an argument about it even less.
Fine! If you want to see me stripping that badly.
Again!? Have you ever considered that maybe you shouldn't mess with an assassin?
This is not really how I expected things to go... at all...
I should reconsider my stance on cheating...
Well, I didn't play very impressively, but maybe I can show you something that will impress you...
I hope you're not expecting a bigger show than the last time...
Really? I prefer summoning one spirit at a time. Some spirits, like Efreet and Undine, don't get along very well...
Say, Estelle... those other two spirits you were talking about aren't called Gnome and Sylph by any chance, are they...?
Even if traditions are very important in Mizuho, you can't deny the influence from the cultures from outside. That's only natural for someone who has traveled around the world.
Oh, really? Not that it would interest me, but it's not about this "naked ribbon" thing that Zelos was talking about once, right?
I'm sorry, Sakura! I can't tell you exactly what I do. It's a well-kept secret, and I'm afraid you'd have to die if you knew too much.
I'm sorry, Sakura! I can't tell you exactly what I do. It's a well-kept secret, and I'm afraid you'd have to die a second time if you knew too much.
I know this will put me on Kyu's level, but this stops you guys from taking another look at my private parts.
If you've got questions, Kaz, you might as well ask them. I'd actually be happy to help you separate real from fake.
Well, you're a perfectly capable woman. I can't expect to win them all.
They work just fine for me. They allow me to do my summoning too. It's what suits me best.
I guess it is sorta weird. Tell me about this Doma place. Who's in charge? Are they anything like me?
And I'm the Chief of Mizuho village.
We don't get scared just because something might be difficult.
I find that... surprising? Are you pulling my leg?
Just one thing? Must be a pretty important thing if it makes you suspect she's a ninja too.
Bobobo. I have no idea what you're talking about.
It takes more than just wanting to be one, ~marinette~. It takes lot of practice and dedication. I wouldn't want them to get hurt doing something they're not ready for...
Okay, I definitely don't know anything about any ghosts. Maybe we just admit your intuition was just totally off this time?
Do you always start planning funerals for people who just met or do you just like me?
Well... I'm glad you're impressed. It wasn't easy getting them to cooperate with me...
I can't think of anyone who would be "into that" happening to them.
Demon? Pretty sure summon spirits and demons have nothing to do with each other. A summon spirit is just a summon spirit, you know?
If your world is split in two as well, then I can understand why the Rheairds would be so interesting to you. I'm surprised you don't already have a way to travel between the two halves.
I know firsthand how dangerous summoning can be. I'm not surprised to hear it's caused trouble in your home as well...
Oh, would these "huge differences" be...
I'm not avoiding anything. Besides, if it's such an innocuous question, why don't you answer it yourself?
Lonely? No! It didn't make me lonely. Don't you think it's fun having everyone around? I mean, I guess it would be nice to get some one on one with someone... bonding when it's just the two of you...
So what? You're just going to pretend that you've never gotten yourself into a bind? Never once tipped off the enemy to your presence?
You should give it some thought. You ought to give people something to grab onto when things get heavy...
I know you're interested in my skills, Akko, but I'm afraid I can't tell you where to learn them. The rules of my village are pretty strict...
Don't worry, Catria! I may have been called an assassin, but I failed the only job I ever was tasked with, and thankfully, I've never had to do it since.
Kyou and Ryou? No, I don't think I know them.
My Summon Spirits can be really useful once in a while, but it's a pain to deal with their personalities. I don't think I have a favorite.
Prince Marth? Sorry, Catria. I can only summon those I have formed a pact with...
Why I wear this sash is a long story, but I can assure you it's not part of a uniform or anything.
Let's see... I think I can part with my sunglasses next. It's actually quite a shame to lose them...
I promise! I won't summon a spirit this time, but let me do one final trick. I can't afford to let this situation get any worse than it is now...
Why I am here? You could call it a break from my job as a chief of the ninja village of Mizuho. So you could say, I'm here to have some fun.
What gave me away? And hey! I'm intimidating!
Well, of course! I don't need two of them like you do, Natsuki.
D-don't be perverts about this...
Are you always such a brat?
...I'm speechless.
Oh? I thought you wanted a show.
Human behavior is so difficult to understand. If you desire to view something splendid, I can provide this easily.
Bunnies are cute... but I'd still prefer to be here with Aska.
I guess I'll take off my bracelet first. Safe!
I'm sorry to disappoint all the pervs in here! I'm just gonna take off my bracelet.
My sandals seem like the obvious next choice. Hey, don't look at me like that, guys! They're a perfectly valid choice!
Let's see... I think I can part with my sunglasses next. I don't think I'll need them in here, anyway...
I do really like this suit. I'm actually kind of sad I might have to take it off here...
Normally I would take those "ears" off as my first piece, but I know they're a fundamental part of the bunny girl look, so I'll keep them while I have other things at my disposal.
My shoes seem like the obvious next choice. Does anyone have an idea what these white things on them are for anyway?
Still hanging onto the ears. Not for any sort of sentimental reason, I assure you...
Well, it was fun, but anything else but the ears would be stupid now.
Here! Hide behind this wall of ice for now, Sheena!
You're really summoning a spirit for this...? But no problem, Sheena! Get behind me and do your thing, I guess...
Where is Aska? I'll not participate in such frivolity without him.
...Daaarknessss!
This is a poor use of our skill and power, but an order is an order.
This task does not violate the terms of our pact, but I fail to see how it fulfills it. Nevertheless...
I guess I'll take off my gloves first. Safe!
I'm sorry to disappoint all the pervs in here! I'm just gonna take off my gloves.
I could add some flair to my stripping with some summoning, but I should probably just save it for emergencies.
My shoes seem like the next obvious choice.
I can't believe you got me out of my shoes.
My sash is easier to take off than it looks. I just have to pull here, and...
Zelos once said I looked like a "gift just waiting to be unwrapped" with my sash... I kicked him for that.
If I had the choice I'd keep my kimono, but you pervs have probably already looked at my underwear.

state.text: ~Player~, you have seen all my summons now, right? That's pretty impressive!

case.state: What? Really? But how can that be? I thought the Summon Spirits could only form a pact with one person at a time... could this be a coincidence?

FOURTEEN?!
